Connections"},"ds_RrJhwvhO":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Network_Traffic.All_Traffic where All_Traffic.action=allowed"},"name":"Allowed Connections"},"ds_67VnkBOo":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true dc(All_Traffic.src_ip) from datamodel=Network_Traffic where All_Traffic.src_ip!=10.0.0.0/8 All_Traffic.src_ip!=192.168.0.0/16 All_Traffic.src_ip!=172.16.0.0/12"},"name":"External Source IP's"},"ds_HsnYyRwJ":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true dc(All_Traffic.dest_ip) from datamodel=Network_Traffic where All_Traffic.dest_ip!=10.0.0.0/8 All_Traffic.dest_ip!=192.168.0.0/16 All_Traffic.dest_ip!=172.16.0.0/12"},"name":"External Destination IP's"},"ds_Ga4hAOP1":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats summariesonly=t allow_old_summaries=t count from datamodel=Web where nodename=Web.Proxy (Web.action=block* OR Web.action=drop*) Web.user!=unknown Web.user!=- Web.app!=not-applicable by Web.category, Web.url 
| rename Web.category as category 
| stats sum(count) as count by category | sort - count"},"name":"Top Blocked Traffic Categories"},"ds_xyGNRLFl":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Network_Traffic.All_Traffic where (All_Traffic.action=block* OR All_Traffic.action=drop*) by All_Traffic.src
| rename "All_Traffic.*" as "*" 
| sort - count 
| head"},"name":"Top Sources by Blocked Connections"},"ds_eZVNObtY":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Network_Traffic.All_Traffic where (All_Traffic.action=block* OR All_Traffic.action=drop*) by All_Traffic.src
| rename "All_Traffic.*" as "*" 
| iplocation src 
| stats sum(count) as count by Country 
| sort - count 
| head 5"},"name":"Top Countries by Blocked Connections"},"ds_xBst1f5q":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats prestats=true local=false summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Network_Traffic.All_Traffic by _time, All_Traffic.action span=10m 
| timechart minspan=10m count by All_Traffic.action"},"name":"Network Traffic by Action (Logarithmic Scale)"},"ds_MYUlpDzK":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Network_Traffic.All_Traffic where (All_Traffic.action=dropped)"},"name":"Dropped Connections"},"ds_YPI5ihnW":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats prestats=true local=false summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Network_Traffic.All_Traffic by _time,All_Traffic.app span=10m 
| timechart minspan=10m count by All_Traffic.app"},"name":"Traffic by App/Protocol"},"ds_G72jyZdc":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats prestats=true local=false summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Network_Traffic.All_Traffic by _time,All_Traffic.transport span=10m 
| timechart minspan=10m count by All_Traffic.transport"},"name":"Traffic by Protocol"},"ds_5eADhh9j_ds_xyGNRLFl":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Network_Traffic.All_Traffic where (All_Traffic.action=block* OR All_Traffic.action=drop* ) by All_Traffic.dest_port
| rename "All_Traffic.*" as "*" 
| sort - count 
| head"},"name":"Blocked Incoming Traffic by Destination
